rooms.name: Grand Entry
rooms.description: You are in the Grand Entry. A painting swings on it's hinges to reveal a hidden safe. There are two sets of grand stairs leading up, and another set leading down inbetween them. You look up to see a shiny chandelier hanging from the ceiling.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: You are in the dining room. The walls are covered in flowered wallpaper with empty picture frames hanging on the walls. The lights are dim and the table is set for 4.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: You are in the kitchen. The paint is chipping and the tiles are cracked, but the kitchen still looks grand thanks to an impressive island in the middle of the room.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: You are in the living room. You can feel a cool breeze coming in from the door, but the fireplace gives off a comforting heat. Out of all the seating in the room, the couch looks the oldest by at least a decade. The carpet is fraying on the ends and is covered in stains, proving it's age.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long dark hallway. There are sconces on both walls, creating just enough light to walk without walking into a wall.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You are in a bathroom. You notice there are 5 periwinkle toilet paper rolls in a basket on the floor. The sink is dripping and the light is flickering, giving you an eerie feeling.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long dark hallway. There are sconces on both walls, creating just enough light to continue without walking into a wall.

rooms.name: Closet
rooms.description: You are in a small coat closet. There are some bent hangers and empty shelves along the back wall.

rooms.name: Pantry
rooms.description: You are in the pantry. There are shelves with rows of jars filled with mysterious substances along the walls. There is water dripping from the ceiling where a water stain grows.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a hallway. The walls are a boring white colour and the wood planks beneath you squeek with every step.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: You are in the garage. There are peg boards on each wall hanging tools and cords.

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: You are in an office. Wood panels line the room from floor to ceiling. There is a bear head coming out of the wall as a decoration. A cup with pens sit on the table next to a box of tissues.

rooms.name: BowlingAlley
rooms.description: You are in the bowling alley.

rooms.name: Upstairs
rooms.description: You are now upstairs. To return the downstairs, go to the NorthEast or NorthWest. There are hallways to the East and West. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Hallway4
rooms.description: You are in a hallway. There are bedrooms to the South and West. To return towards the stairs and other hallway, go East.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. To return to the hallway, go to the North. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long hallway. To return towards the stairs and other hallway, go West. There is a small towel closet to the South. To go further down the hallway, go East.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long hallway. The hallway continues to the East and West. There is a bedroom to the South.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. To return to the hallway, go to the North. There is a small bathroom to the East. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You are in a small bathroom. There are bedrooms to the East and West. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. To return to the hallway, go North. There is a small bathroom to the West. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long hallway. The hallway continues to the West. There is a locked door leading to a balcony to the West. There is an office to the North and a bedroom to the South.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: You are on the balcony. To return to the hallway, go to the West. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: You are in an old library filled with books. To return to the office, go South. On one of the shelves lies a ripped piece of paper.

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: You are in an office. To return to the hallway, go South. There is a locked door leading to a library on the North wall. DESCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. There is a small closet to the West. ADD DESCRIPTION OF ITEMS.

rooms.name: Closet
rooms.description: You are in a small closet. To return to the bedroom, go East. There is a ladder leading to the attic, to the West. ADD DESCRIPTION OF ITEMS.

rooms.name: Attic
rooms.description: You are in a run down attic. To return to the closet, go East. While entering the room, you trip over a loose floor board.

rooms.name: Basement
rooms.description: You are in the basement. The theatre is North, and there is a bowling alley to the West. There are winding steps leading down to the East, and a larger set of stairs leading up to the South.

rooms.name: Closet2
rooms.description: You are in a small closet with empty shelves. To return to the hallway, go North.

rooms.name: Patio
rooms.description: You are outside on the patio. To return to the inside, go West. There is a dirt path to the South.

rooms.name: Path
rooms.description: You are on a dirt path. The patio is to the North and there is a flower garden to the South. The dirt path continues to the East. You can re-enter the house by going West.

rooms.name: Path
rooms.description: You are on a dirt path. There is a shed to the East. The dirt path continues to the North and West.

rooms.name: Path
rooms.description: You are on a dirt path. The dirt path continues to the South. There is a ladder leading to a tree house to the North.

rooms.name: Shed
rooms.description: You are in a small shed. To return to the dirt path, go West. Inside the shed there is a lawnmower and a shovel. You notice the dirt on the ground is uneven.

rooms.name: Tree House
rooms.description: You are in a tree house above the ground. To return to the dirt path, go South. When You look out the window, you can see a piece of paper on the balcony.

rooms.name: Garden
rooms.description: You are in the garden. You are surrounded by flowers and theres one violet flower that stands out. To return to the dirt path, go North.

rooms.name: Outside
rooms.description: You are outside. The front gate is locked, to the North. To return inside, go South.

rooms.name: Cellar
rooms.description: You are in an empty cellar. There is one wine bottle on the ground. To go up the stairs, go West. There is a locked door to a bunker to the South, and a door leading to a confusing looking hallway to the East.

rooms.name: Bunker
rooms.description: You are in the bunker. OH NO! As you walk into the bunker, the door closes and locks behind you. It looks like you already know the code to get out but be careful, who knows what will happen if you get it wrong 5 times...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Theatre
rooms.description: You are in the theatre. The smell of popcorn still lingers in the air.
